website_summaries.verdict: Premium espresso maker for coffee connoisseurs delivers great tasting coffee in under a minute.
pros: Elegant, attractive design looks great on a countertop
The machine makes rich and delicious coffee and is programmable to suit varied tastes
Compact size takes up little space
Comes with a starter coffee pod pack
cons: Larger mugs may not fit under the machine and it's a bit loud

customer_reviews.title: SWEET!
customer_reviews.text: Never owned an Nespresso machine before until now. Well what a difference in a cup of coffee this made for me. I put in (2) Originaline Nespresso pods to give me the BEST 8oz cup of coffee I have really ever had in my life. Seriously! This is so much better how it brews up compared to my old Bunn coffee maker. Small little bad boy with tons of power at 19 bar for a robust flavorful Java! Powerhouse is an understatement, but best thing I can come up with in such a small package. Get you one to try out and all I can say is my experience has been nothing short of AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Cost effective way to make expresso with no compromise
customer_reviews.text: Three things I like about this and this may help your decision making, 1. Compact 2. Quick 3. Flavorful (Either Nespresso pods or Peets Pods) To get more out of the pods use this way! There are 2 settings. 1. Dispensing a shot and 2. dispensing 3 times the volume of a shot. I use Option 1 First and Option 2. immediately after 1. is completed. You get the worth of each pod. Enjoy! This will never disappoint you. Far easier to make a coffee or expresso than any other machine out there. Easy to clean too. I press the
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: A nice looking machine with a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: If you like espresso but don't want to put in the work to make your own properly, this is a great system. It's a bit noisy (it sounds a lot like a 12V powered air compressor) but it's trying to produce 19 bar of pressure so it's understandable. I've noticed the buttons have a tendency to get stuck if you press them towards the outside edge (it's happened to me with both the espresso and lungo sizes) but just press them again to free them up. I been using it everyday once or twice a day for the past two weeks and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: yoshij96

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine But It Vibrates
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine. Makes great espresso, but I had to take away one star because mine vibrates so much that the espresso glasses tend to move away from the spout. I have to hold them in place or the coffee will miss the glass because the vibration causes it to move. Aside from this minor annoyance, it is a fine machine. Love the fact that it turns on very quickly, makes great espresso with the required foam and then either turns off automatically after a few minutes or I can turn it off manually immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Gumbinner

customer_reviews.title: Easy, powerful, and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: One use so far, and tried with Nespresso and Peet’s pods. Nespresso pods seem to result in richer end product. The machine couldn’t be easier to operate. Instead of taking water reservoir out to refill, I bring water to it to avoid the leaking issue some have experienced. So far, she’s a winner! I’ll be sure to update if I find any quality issues. One small disappointment was to find that the enclosed Nespresso pods were four months expired. I purchased this at the end of November 2018 and the pods expired in July 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Timezone711

customer_reviews.title: Kind of useless if you want a full cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a full cup of coffee look elsewhere. Nothing wrong with the unit, but not really what I wanted. $200 is a lot of money, and you're locked in to buying coffee cartridges. You can buy the stainless cartridge where the top unscrews to load whatever coffee you want, but those are pretty expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Little

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it a year and now it leaks water all over when in use. Of course, I can’t reach Amazon for assistance and Breville USA Support is also proving difficult to reach. It was great while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: RockA

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: This machine is about what I expected but the temperature of the coffee is low. I drink it with a little milk and I had started to heat the milk before adding coffee to the cup. Now I also microwave the full cup of coffee after it is made for an additional 30 seconds. The heating element is seriously under-powered in this model. Addendum: I hate my new machine. If you like coffee that looks more like tea, this could be for you. I thought I would get a single serving of good strong coffee. NOT!! Avoid. I got a good price. Now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little machine.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about two weeks. Love the design, small footprint but plenty capable for my family of 6. The first cups of coffee were a bit weaker than my old Rivo, but now it makes great expresso. You just have to try different capsules. I found the nespresso knock offs at BB&B to be excellent here, and much cheaper than the Nespresso ones. Also try the ones from Decitaly. Real Italian made coffee, super affordable, and very flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: Merilalla

customer_reviews.title: Appears to have been used or handled heavily
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with a sticker indicating that it is “new”. But it appears used to me. The box and contents appear to have been opened many (?) times. Not clear if the appliance was used and resold as new. But the box containing the coffee pods...which should have zipped open with cardboard...had been opened by someone else. Perhaps a pod was a added? And it was re-sold as new. Hard to tell... But I am not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Sanook Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Incredible small espresso maker!
customer_reviews.text: Just couldn't be easier! We love this little machine. Works like a charm. Also bought the Nespresso Aeroccino 4 milk frother at the same time, and it makes stellar frothed milk and can be washed in the dishwasher. The espressos included originally with the machine were very good but limited, but we prefer Peet's espresso pods.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with expired coffee pods in a used-looking box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a New machine, but the box is heavily worn on the edges and the coffee sampler inside expired over 6 months ago. It looks like a Used or old product.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Y. Jondal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and better for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: We were drip coffee consumers. We would grind our own beans (Starbucks) and felt like this was economical. After our kids moved out, there were mornings it didn’t make sense to make the big pot of coffee so we bought a Keurig. It was great coffee but I hated the thought that you couldn’t recycle those pods. My friend owns the Pixie and we got hooked! I love the machine and the milk defrother. I love the fact that we have quality coffee every morning! The ease of use is amazing. We have had it for 2 months and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Slowly Died in about a year
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked well (made a decently strong espresso shot) for about 3 months, then over the proceeding 9 months got weaker and weaker. Now, I am using the strongest capsule, and even the first second of espresso is light brown, and quickly goes clear. My mother's smaller breville nespresso machine makes a much stronger cup and is 2 years older. My machine didn't get weak until after the 3 month return window. Designed obsolescence? I would appreciate a replacement from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Nice looking, easy to use, and great coffee. This is my first Nespresso machine, and I love it. Yes, the pods are a little expensive, but the coffee is so good. I also like that the company will recycle the used pods. I've wasted a lot of money on mediocre coffee, so now at least I know I'm getting something I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little nespresso coffee machine. We have had this for a while now and us it constantly. We had a party for about 30 people this summer and we used this small machine to make cappucccino’s for everyone. It was a slow process because it’s not meant for such use but we put it to the test and it performed very well. Love the compact size and ease of use. Great for your morning cup of coffee, quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie & Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good machine. Makes good espresso.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it so far. I was not happy though that I happened upon the exact same machine at TJ Maxx the other day for $150 though. Small footprint, looks nice. I have a Breville waffle maker and it is great, so I expect this will last as well. I really like the simplicity of operations and the fact that it has only 3 buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jr

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and compact
customer_reviews.text: Got the pixie to replace my 10 yr old U which was starting to have intermittent issues. The design on the pixie is so much more stylish and contemporary. It’s also a much smaller/compact size than the U so it fits even nicer on the counter. Only downside is the pixie does drip more after brew and when you eject the pod then the U did (no drips). Hopefully this one will last another 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: EWW

customer_reviews.title: but I am in love, so far
customer_reviews.text: I only got this yesterday, but I am in love, so far. Super easy to set up and fill. Heats up really fast (30 seconds or less). Makes an excellent crema on the espresso (with true Nespresso pods, I haven't tried off-brands). Also love that Nespresso offers free recycling on the pods and coffee.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee but annoying faults
customer_reviews.text: I personally don’t mind that it’s super noisy. What I don’t like it that when it says it is ready for me to put a pod in, it sprays hot water when I open it up to put the pod in and then that leaks out underneath. It can get a little messy since not many cups fit under it. BUT it makes a delicious cup of coffee
customer_reviews.author: LVM

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of Nespresso and their quality of coffees
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso What Else :-) Replaced my machine with exact same one as the pump stopped working and all the YouTube videos did not fix the problem. Huge fan of Nespresso and their quality of coffees
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Broke within months
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended, just had to buy another coffee maker. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Check pod options before buying
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I only drink espresso unless someone else makes coffee for me. Most people take issue with the limited third party pod options but the Nespresso pods are outstanding. Potential buyers should be sure that this line will have the coffee options they're into before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Al928

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant, easy to use, good coffee (from good pod) - all I ever wanted in a coffee machine ?
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - Simple, elegant, easy to use, good coffee (from good pod) - all I ever wanted in a coffee machine ? With Bestprresso or Peets pods the taste is great. LEDs indicating 'low on water' is a nice touch. All in all I am happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but.
customer_reviews.text: With all of the original nespresso machines out there, I am satisfied with this one. However, the description says that the bundle includes the Aeroccino 3. Mine came without an extra wisk and the base does not have the "extra wisk storage" . I found that very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My gf used to work for Starbucks and loves this. Some reviews remark on some of the plastic components breaking which is true in the long run some of the plastic pieces will break and a more expensive machine would have more metal components. Will probably buy again when this one breaks in a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny H.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Simple, and Awesome looking!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing espresso. This is a beatifully designed compact brewer that produces a wonderful espresso. It reaches temperature incredibly fast and takes up very little space. So simple to use and so compact I am considering taking it on our upcoming roadtrip.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBear

customer_reviews.title: Best Home Espresso Machine, Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Compact, simple, sleek machine makes a mean espresso: creamy, smooth, and full bodied. The machine takes two minutes (or less) to set-up. The sample capsules provide a nice variety of flavor profiles. I’m so pleased that I bought this machine. The only bad thing I can say is that the machine runs super loud. It takes about 30 seconds to run but you’ll definitely disturb any light sleepers in your home. I don’t mind the noise as I focus on what’s pouring out of the machine. Buy it, you’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: creamy
customer_reviews.text: this machine is a hands down no brainer.. believe me when i tell you its creamier and better than the 8000. machines.. no second guessing this machine
customer_reviews.author: Frank N.

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty loud when working, but it works great. Been through many hundreds of pods with this little guy and it's as good as new. Never had an issue at all. Just keeps going.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: travel brewing capability, to save you those starbuck's visits at $20 a pop.
customer_reviews.text: The pods are expensive, but the portability, and the availability are worth it. Never settle for ordinary coffee again, as you'll always be able to carry this with you.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Stunned

customer_reviews.title: The pixie is a great machine - it is replacing an older Essenza model
customer_reviews.text: The pixie is a great machine - it is replacing an older Essenza model. Really minor differences between this model and a less expensive Essenza Mini - just depends on your preferences. Does heat up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: jwf

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as original
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a replacement for the same machine that I had for several years. While it looks the same, it is definitely of cheaper quality, it works fine, just not sure if it will last as long as the first Nespresso Pixie I had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for over 2 yrs and it still works perfect, I used it roughly about 4-5 times a day! Love it and wouldn’t change it for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my Espresso Machine!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin brought me the espresso cups so I needed to buy a machine to enjoy them. This machine is small, easy to use and clean. I really like it. It is pricey but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Woods

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean. My favorite appliance in the kitchen. It does take some generic pods. The milk frother is perfect for hot cocoa, London fogs, cappuccino and lattes. Never burns the milk. It stops when done.
customer_reviews.author: Thriftaddict

customer_reviews.title: Great compact coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: The coffee tastes amazing! It’s compact and easy to clean. You will have delicious coffee in just minutes! Love this Nespresso Pixie coffee maker by Breville.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have bought. I have one for home and one at my office. This is a present for a daughter who has fallen in love with the one I have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine!
customer_reviews.text: The machine makes each cup reliably with a good amount of crema. It is very quick to heat up and go so I love using this when I am in a rush!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee
customer_reviews.text: Coffee does not hurt my stomach. Enjoy it every morning. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Sleek appearance
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Howe

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I thought since I bought the more expensive one then it would be better but that doesn’t hold true. Espresso doesn’t come out as foamy as the one I used at a hotel one time. A little disappointed I spent so much and rarely use it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pisano

customer_reviews.title: Great expresso, small foot print
customer_reviews.text: It brews quickly, the pods make it super convenient (they even have pods for it a Trader Joes) It's a bit retro looking, love it
customer_reviews.author: C. Muir

customer_reviews.title: So great! You need one in your life.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Make a latte or cappuccino everyday. Quick and easy to use. Tasty too!
customer_reviews.author: Tika Johnson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the nespresso. This is so much better than drip or even chemex in my opinion. You can make really nice drinks like they do at cafe's with this.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the coffee house
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! It makes the most delicious espresso shots. While each cup is slightly more expensive, it's far less than buying from a coffee house every day
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Watching the espresso come out is a thing of beauty. It’s so simple to use and I just can’t say enough great things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: I love this nespresso machine
customer_reviews.text: We stayed in a hotel that had this espresso maker and I ordered one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine- Great Bundle-
customer_reviews.text: The espresso machine is a great starter for anyone hoping to get to try new kinds of coffee easily and conveniently. I simply love it. The assortment of flavors in the bundle is great. The milk frother works well also, but I honestly rather have the espresso straight. Highly recommend the bundle though!
customer_reviews.author: S. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and carefree
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it claimed. Works perfectly. Coffee is decent. Beats doing all the work and subsequent cleanup of a real espresso machine. A hell of a lot cheaper also.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It gets used ~8 times a day. Good stuff and still functional
customer_reviews.author: Armand Gerstenberger

customer_reviews.title: Temperature
customer_reviews.text: Great small machine, I wish coffee was hotter when it comes out if machine, I usually have to micro it it to get it hot, but then I haven’t found another one better, I own three.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Pixie for Nespresso, great coffee you can count on!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Pixie machine, this one is for the office. Since I share with others I wanted the durability and simplicity of the Pixie model.
customer_reviews.author: NVa Techie

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Does exactly what you want it to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Does exactly what you want it to do in a small footprint. The only downside is that the pods automatically drop down into a catch below the system. While this may seem useful, the moisture and darkness cause mold to grow very fast. Would be easier to just remove pod after use. Keep it clean and you got a good system!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Greene

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This machine did not work from the moment I took it out of the box. It also came with a European plug. It advertised as new but seems used/refurbished. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting coffee! I am still in the stage of figuring out what coffee pods I like best, but it is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Best single serve espresso/coffee machine for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pixie and was purchased for guest cottage ( didn’t want to surrender our first one any longer)! Love these coffee/ espresso more than going out for coffee anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: suzi

customer_reviews.title: Pixie is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting espresso in a few seconds. This is a great small machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: Love my espresso machine, wouldn't want to be without it. Works great, is well made, not too big for my counter
customer_reviews.author: Carol Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good quality machine for great espresso!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite way to brew coffee in the AM. A bit pricey but well worth the money if you enjoy convenient espresso with great flavor. The sample pack arrived with several smashed pods.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great "little" machine
customer_reviews.text: Love it because it is small, does not take up a huge space just to make coffee. Can fill a coffee cups from expresso to tall mug. Hardest part is getting pods to fit. So far all have to be Nespresso coffee. Still looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lailla

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to brew a cup.
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long to brew and sometimes just spits coffee, had this product since Feb 2019 and very annoyed. Clean it every few weeks and still doesnt brew correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Reitz

customer_reviews.title: Quality machine
customer_reviews.text: I love Nespresso and this machine is easy to use and gives a great quality coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Johan M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Nespresso! I traded in my $750 machine for the Titan, it takes up less countertop space, requires much less cleaning and makes much better espresso. Hands down, this is the most consistent, best tasting, inexpensive espresso machine option.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Espresso anyone ?
customer_reviews.text: Ready to use straight outta the box ,flavors are great .it takes less then a minute to make a cup of espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this machine!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing machine. It makes terrific lungo and espresso. Heats up in less than a minutes and the flavor of the coffee far exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great machine as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great Espresso machine, easy to use, no mess, boiling hot espresso every time. The machine I received was made in Switzerland, and is definitely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mirage

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Nespresso. It's compact and I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Diaz

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for gift. That person is really happy and loves making coffee with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Same great flavor as our old Nespresso machine. Would recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Carlito's Abuela

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic and works great! Small, quick, easy to use and to clean. I have had amazing taste espressos / cappuccinos in Italy but for home, this machine is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Botis

customer_reviews.title: Use every day!
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and makes an excellent cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Larson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect espresso!
customer_reviews.text: This is so slim and fits my tiny space. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: LoftBiz2015

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little machine
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little machine. I held off getting one of these for a while but so much easier than heading to local coffee shop before work. Simple to operate and clean, heats up fast, and makes great espresso. Sample pack makes it easy to find your favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Tmrz

customer_reviews.title: A great little machine that makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little Nespresso machine. Makes hot coffee every time.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Do

customer_reviews.title: More expedive machines save you money on the types of pods you can use
customer_reviews.text: Best espresso machine for the money,replacing a pixie I had over 5 yrs,other espresso machines I had I’d be lucky to get 2 yrs out of 1
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Box was open and pieces were missing. Apeeras to be used
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the product because it was used. Purchased as new
customer_reviews.author: Angry customer

customer_reviews.title: Good not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for what it is. Not like going to a coffee shop, but I didn’t expect that. Good product overall
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jablonski

customer_reviews.title: The machine is very impressive and its packaging is excellent but I found out that it is running at ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine is very impressive and its packaging is excellent but I found out that it is running at 110 volts and I had to buy an adapter to run it because the electricity in my Saudi Arabia 220 volts
customer_reviews.author: Maram K.

customer_reviews.title: Only accepts Nespresso capsules or machine will break
customer_reviews.text: First coffee capsule broke and clogged up mechanism. However, we cleaned it and machine had worked perfectly since.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A.B. Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Ok for occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty noisy and was delivered with expired capsules. Not sure about the durability but it appears sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and the coffee is great.
customer_reviews.text: Very practical. Nice to have a nice cup of expresso in a couple of minutes with no mess and extensive cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE BOTH OF THEM
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Pixie. have 2, one in each home!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Vendetti

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This machine has changed my life! I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: remjem

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I never received the welcome pod packet. Was excited to try but couldn't right away
customer_reviews.author: Marisol S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's so easy to use, there's no mess, and the lattes are perfect and delicious every time.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great quality, compact & attractive looking!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to use, consistent espresso quality.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Joseph

customer_reviews.title: ... so simple to use and the espresso tastes really good.
customer_reviews.text: It is so simple to use and the espresso tastes really good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Aguilar Jr.

customer_reviews.title: They need pods. Expensive ones too.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a regular espresso machine but when I got the pods, I was heavily disappointed. I wouldn’t recommend getting these unless you want to spend money and time buying these expensive pods. I rather buy the coffee and use a stovetop espresso maker and enjoy an actual espresso. One star because it’s great for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso Originale is the only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research comparing this with the newer virtuoline. If you want espresso, this machine is where it’s at. It fits amazing on the counter top, and my preference is to hit each button once on top with one pod. It gives me just enough coffee to fill one of these JoyJolt Savor Double Wall Insulated Glasses Espresso Mugs (Set of 2) - 5.4-Ounces  ———my favorite espresso cups. I also recommend: Mind Reader Coffee Pod Storage Drawer for K-Cups, Verismo, Dolce Gusto, Holds 12 K-Cups, 16 Nespresso Capsules, 14 CBTL, Verismo, Dolce Gusto, Black  That will save you counter-space and provide easy access to pods.
customer_reviews.author: Braxar

customer_reviews.title: Good solid easy espresso maker
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good looking machine with a small foot print. Parts are easy to clean, but they prefer you don't put them in the dishwasher, which is inconvenient, but not a big deal. Makes excellent espresso and if you buy a milf frother mochiattos. Cons: pedestal for cup only has two setting up or down. Down wil fit espresso cups for 1-3 oz. or some small tea cups. Up for bigger cups-problem is spout does not stick out far enough for most mugs so you have to hold it so all the espresso goes into the cup. This by far is the only real flaw in the design. Still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 13 months of very limited use
customer_reviews.text: This little machine chose to die 1 month after it's warranty expired. To make it worse, I travel a lot so used it less than 50% of the time and then ONLY 2 capsules a day. don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: cdmofwa

customer_reviews.title: Cute but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute on the counter but stopped working properly after 6 weeks (just past return) with use 1x/day. The water stops coming through after about 5 seconds, then we push again and get another 5 seconds, and after 3-4x we have to hold the button down to get it to finish. Very discouraging for this price. UPDATE: Still have the problem, but the seller is helping get resolution. If things change, I'll update again. It's such a great little machine when it works!
customer_reviews.author: pcmphd

customer_reviews.title: Great - small and makes great drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a small machine, as we already had a keurig on our counter. Also wanted it easy to keep clean. This is perfect. I have a separate small battery powered milk whisk -aero latte- , so I heat some milk in the micro, then have the steamed milk and foam. It’s great. Easy to use and clean. Makes a noise but not really loud and it all makes U feel like a barista. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nigel K

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home lattes
customer_reviews.text: This little espresso machine and milk frother combo is dope. The Nespresso pods make good coffee, it’s quick, tasty, and efficient. The milk frother makes amazing foam and combined blows Starbucks coffee right out of the water for a fraction of the price. I’m super pleased with how easy it is to use and how easy it is to make nice and fancy feeling cappuccinos and lattes. The footprint is incredibly small, takes up almost no counter space (especially compared to the Keurig) and heats up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jessilee99

customer_reviews.title: I find distilled water to be the best to use in the water tank.
customer_reviews.text: What is not there to like. There are some things one must be aware of. One: Make sure one seats the handle all the way down when closing. Two: Empty the pod catcher and clean out the water collector. Do it often so it does not fill up with cups and water. Three: after each use, run the unit with out a pod. Let it rest so it can drain. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: TarqtheSharkUSA

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: I thought about buying a Nespresso machine for a long while but didn't see how that would fit with how we drink our coffee (being used to a pot of coffee to drink over time). Well, once I tried the Pixie by having an Americano style of coffee (by pushing the lungo button an extra time), I was sold. We bought one, love all of the different coffees, and now put our regular coffee maker away. The taste is just so much better, and I like the ease in making it. I also like that the pods are recycleable (or we wouldn't have bought it).
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviews

customer_reviews.title: Used not new
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked fine for one month then began to behave erratically. When I tried to get help from Nespresso I learned that the machine was used and reconditioned. Nowhere in the original product decription does it say "USED."
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy, and noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to be returning this item. It's very sturdy, so good looking, and works well. Except, at least once, pod did not puncture, and I had to drop pod in again. The noise could wake the dead! I REALLY love how it looks. Main reason for return is that pod coffee never tastes as good as fresh ground beans. I am keeping my Nespresso frother, though, (the newest model 4; forgot name). I love it and can use it for coffee, etc. Still, you might consider this machine. It's almost perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kitchens and makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully designed machine and takes up so little room on my kitchen counter top and makes great coffee in a short time. The milk frother is also very easy to use and froths milk very quickly. Both machines are also very easy to clean. It's such a shame the company is fazing this beautiful design out for a cheaper unattractive model.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Best cup of coffee on this planet
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I am an admitted coffee holic, and bought this after I had a cup of coffee from this at a hotel. I waited two years though, but will never go back to french press. I love the nespresso pods, but love the Peets even more. They both offer free recycling, which is really important to me.
customer_reviews.author: LAgurl

product_meta.title: Breville-Nespresso USA BEC420TTN1AUC1 Pixie Espresso Machine, Titan
product_meta.description: Color:TitanThe Nespresso Pixie by Breville Espresso machine offers avant-garde design with elegance and functionality. Equipped with a wide range of advanced features, the Pixie machine is energy efficient with a surprisingly compact design. Only 4.33 in. wide, it uses hardly any space and is perfect for smaller urban kitchens. At only 8 lbs. it is also easily portable. The one-touch buttons with two capacities (espresso and lungo) can be reprogrammed to custom volumes and are backlit for ease of use. The 19 bar high-pressure pump allows for barista-style result, unlocking the delicate flavors and premium aromas of each Coffee capsule during the brewing process and creating an incomparable dense and unctuous crema. The fast heat-up system reaches the ideal temperature in just 25 seconds, while the automatic power-off-function means the machine turns off 9 minutes after the last use. Streamlined for maximum efficiency, this Coffee maker lives up to Nespresso's reputation for high-end technology. Each machine includes a welcome set with 16 espresso capsules, containing individual aromas. Cable storage
feature_bullets: POWERFUL: Nespresso Pixie espresso maker has a 19 bar high-pressure pump that allows for a barista-style result, unlocking the delicate flavor of each coffee capsule.
EFFICIENT AND ENERGY SAVING ESPRESSO MAKER: System heats-up to ideal temperature in just 25 seconds and automatically turns off after 9 minutes, consuming less energy.

EASE OF USE: The Pixie is a programmable espresso maker with two one-touch buttons to create your favorite coffee and espresso recipes into the desired size; Espresso (2.7 oz), or Lungo (5 oz). Pour over ice to create your favorite iced coffee drinks.

SMART ESPRESSO MAKER: The red blacklights light up to let you know when the 24 oz. water tank needs to be refilled. The folding drip tray accommodates larger single serve cups and recipes such as lattes or cappuccinos. The Pixie is also easy to clean, the spent capsules are neatly ejected into an internal receptacle.
COMPLIMENTARY GIFT: Each machine includes a Nespresso Original welcome kit with a range of 14 capsules with unique aroma profiles.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars321 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
